### Detailed Breakdown **Product Development ($750K)** - Engineering Team (4 hires): $400K - AI/ML Development: $200K - Cloud Infrastructure & Tools: $100K - 3rd Party Integrations: $50K **Marketing & Growth ($450K)** - Influencer Partnerships: $200K - Paid Acquisition: $150K - Events & Sponsorships: $70K - Content & Marketing Materials: $30K **Operations & Team ($225K)** - Salaries & Recruiting: $150K - Office & Admin: $40K - Team Events & Culture: $35K **Legal & Compliance ($75K)** - Legal & Regulatory: $40K - Child Safety Compliance: $25K - Working Capital / Runway: $10K
Monthly Burn
$83K
Runway
18 months
Revenue Ramp
$0 → $250K/mo
 --- # Market Opportunity ## $4.7B Total Addressable Market
### Market Size Calculation
Total Addressable Market (TAM)
$4.7B
15.7M youth athletes × $300/year avg. recruiting spend
Serviceable Addressable Market (SAM)
$1.08B
Focus on recruiting-active athletes (13-18) + 39M family members + 20K coaches
Serviceable Obtainable Market (SOM - Year 3)
$50-100M
5-10% of SAM within 3 years
### Market Growth Drivers
Global Youth Sports Market
$37.5B → $85.2B
2022 to 2030-2031
CAGR: 7-10% annually
Transfer Portal Impact
Expanded addressable market by 5-10x
More athletes eligible to transfer, more coaches recruiting transfers
Tech Adoption Curve
Recruiting tech moving from manual/email to software-enabled
(Similar to enterprise recruiting 10 years ago)
Year 3 Revenue Potential
1% athlete penetration (150K athletes × $15/mo avg) + 5% coach penetration (1,000 coaches × $50/mo) = ~$50-60M revenue
 --- # Risks & Mitigations ## We've Identified Key Risks and Have Strategies
⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory (COPPA, FERPA)
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA, state laws
Mitigation: Hire child safety officer, age verification, parental consent flow, background checks for coaches, regular compliance audits, privacy-by-design architecture
⚠️ NCAA Compliance & Regulatory Changes
NCAA rules change frequently; platform could enable violations
Mitigation: Build AI-powered NCAA compliance agent, publish communication guidelines, regular review with NCAA experts, closed beta to validate approach
⚠️ Coach Adoption & B2B Sales Challenges
Coaches are conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier for coaches, influencer partnerships with respected coaches, quantify time savings ("Save 10 hours per week"), flexible pricing models
⚠️ Athlete Privacy & Data Security
Athlete profiles contain sensitive data (stats, academic info, location)
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II certification (Year 1), regular security audits, minimal data retention, user-controlled privacy settings, cybersecurity insurance
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Build fairness constraints into algorithm, regular bias audits, transparent model outputs, athlete appeal/feedback mechanism, start with one sport and expand carefully
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable when critical mass of users present (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship viral loop, start with niche (volleyball clubs), influencer partnerships, geographic clustering (3-4 states first)
Risk Management Approach
We've identified critical risks and built mitigation strategies into our product roadmap and budget allocation
 --- # Competitive Landscape ## Why We Win: AI-Native in a Legacy Market
### Direct Competitors
NCSA (Largest Player)
  • • Founded 1997 (20+ years old)

  • • Weakness: Legacy architecture, recently sold, slow to innovate
FieldLevel
  • • Founded 2015 (10 years old)
  • • 1M athletes, 5K coaches
  • • Revenue: $10-20M (estimated)
  • • AI: None (basic search/filter)
  • • Weakness: No AI automation, no livestreaming
SportsRecruits
  • • Founded 2008
  • • 500K athletes
  • • Revenue: $5-10M (estimated)
  • • AI: None
  • • Weakness: Acquired by NCSA in 2024
### Why We Win
1. AI-Native Architecture
Built 2025 with AI as core product vs. retrofitting AI as afterthought. Better product, faster iteration, defensible tech.
2. Livestreaming Moat
One-tap livestreaming creates unique network effects. Competitors have no livestreaming (manual upload only).
3. Social Layer
Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth growth.
4. Founder-Market Fit
Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability. We live this problem.
5. Timing
NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI is proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.
"By the time incumbents respond (1-2 years), we'll have network effects, coach adoption, and athlete habit locked in."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # The Ask & Vision ## Join Us in Revolutionizing College Recruiting
$1.5M SAFE at $10M cap
### What We'll Achieve - **Product:** Complete MVP across 3 sports with AI-native features - **Traction:** 10,000+ athletes, 100+ paying programs, $100K+ MRR - **Team:** Hire 6-8 core team members - **Market:** Establish in 5-10 states with deep volleyball penetration - **Path to Series A:** Clear $5-10M round in Q4 2026
### Investment Terms - **Structure:** SAFE (Simple Agreement for Future Equity) - **Valuation Cap:** $10M post-money - **No Discount:** Standard SAFE - **Dilution:** 10-15% for this seed round
### Our Vision "In five years, Athlead will be the standard platform for college recruiting. Every athlete will have a digital recruiting profile. Every coach will use Athlead to discover and manage prospects. Every family will use Athlead to navigate the recruiting process. **We'll have democratized access to college sports**—no more advantages for wealthy families who can afford recruiting consultants. Every athlete, regardless of background, will have the tools to get discovered."

# Athlead Seed Round Pitch Deck (Slidev)

A comprehensive 15-slide investor pitch deck for Athlead, built with Slidev.

## Overview

This presentation covers:
- The problem with college recruiting (multi-stakeholder pain)
- Why now? (Market catalysts + technical readiness)
- The Athlead solution (AI-native recruiting ecosystem)
- Competitive advantage (AI-native vs. legacy platforms)
- Product demo and user journey
- Traction and validation
- Business model and revenue streams
- Go-to-market strategy (3-phase approach)
- 18-month roadmap to Series A
- Use of funds ($1.5M deployment)
- Market opportunity ($4.7B TAM)
- Risks and mitigations
- Competitive landscape
- The ask and vision

## Quick Start

### Install dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

### Start the dev server
```bash
npm run dev
```

The presentation will be available at http://localhost:3030

### Build for production
```bash
npm run build
```

### Export to PDF
```bash
npm run export
```

The PDF will be saved as `slides-export.pdf`

## Project Structure

```
athlead-slidev-v2/
├── slides.md           # Main presentation slides
├── style.css           # Custom Athlead theme styles
├── package.json        # Dependencies and scripts
├── public/             # Static assets (images, etc.)
└── README.md          # This file
```

## Customization

### Theme Colors

The presentation uses the Athlead brand colors defined in `style.css`:
- Blue: `#3b82f6`
- Purple: `#8b5cf6`
- Dark: `#0a0a0a`
- Dark Alt: `#1a1a2e`

### Adding Images

Place images in the `public/` folder and reference them in slides using:
```markdown
![Alt text](/image-name.png)
```

### Navigation

- Use arrow keys or spacebar to navigate slides
- Press `f` for fullscreen
- Press `o` for overview mode
- Press `d` for dark mode toggle

## Key Features

- 15 comprehensive slides covering all aspects of the pitch
- Animated slide transitions with v-click
- Responsive grid layouts
- Custom gradient styling matching Athlead brand
- Interactive navigation
- PDF export capability

## Speaking Time

Estimated presentation time: 20-25 minutes
Q&A: 5-10 minutes
Total: ~30 minutes

## Tips for Presenting

1. Start with the problem (make it visceral)
2. Show the opportunity (massive market)
3. Introduce the solution (elegant, AI-native)
4. Prove traction (customer validation)
5. Show the team (founder-market fit)
6. Ask for capital (clear use of funds)
7. Paint the vision (5-year outcome)

## Built With

- [Slidev](https://sli.dev/) - Presentation slides for developers
- Vue.js components
- Markdown
- Custom CSS styling

## License

Copyright © 2025 Athlead. All rights reserved.

--- layout: two-cols --- # The Problem ## College Recruiting is Broken for Everyone ::left:: ### Athletes & Families - **20+ hours/week** on manual recruitment tasks - Manually reviewing film and creating highlight videos - Copy-pasting "personalized" emails to hundreds of coaches - Manual research on programs and fit - Lack of guidance from clubs and teams

**Impact:** - Incomplete recruiting pipelines - Missed talent due to limited visibility - Risk of NCAA violations --- # The Problem (continued)

 --- # Risks & Mitigations ## We've Identified Key Risks and Have Strategies
⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory (COPPA, FERPA)
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA, state laws
Mitigation: Hire child safety officer, age verification, parental consent flow, background checks for coaches, regular compliance audits, privacy-by-design architecture
⚠️ NCAA Compliance & Regulatory Changes
NCAA rules change frequently; platform could enable violations
Mitigation: Build AI-powered NCAA compliance agent, publish communication guidelines, regular review with NCAA experts, closed beta to validate approach
⚠️ Coach Adoption & B2B Sales Challenges
Coaches are conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier for coaches, influencer partnerships with respected coaches, quantify time savings ("Save 10 hours per week"), flexible pricing models
⚠️ Athlete Privacy & Data Security
Athlete profiles contain sensitive data (stats, academic info, location)
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II certification (Year 1), regular security audits, minimal data retention, user-controlled privacy settings, cybersecurity insurance
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Build fairness constraints into algorithm, regular bias audits, transparent model outputs, athlete appeal/feedback mechanism, start with one sport and expand carefully
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable when critical mass of users present (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship viral loop, start with niche (volleyball clubs), influencer partnerships, geographic clustering (3-4 states first)

Built 2025 with AI as core product vs. retrofitting AI as afterthought. Better product, faster iteration, defensible tech.

One-tap livestreaming creates unique network effects. Competitors have no livestreaming (manual upload only).

Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth growth.

Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability. We live this problem.

NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI is proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.

# Athlead Pitch Deck Presentation Guide

## Overview
This is a comprehensive 15-slide Slidev presentation for Athlead's seed round fundraising ($1.5M SAFE at $10M cap).

## Slide Breakdown

### Slide 1: Title / Hook
**Duration:** 1 minute
**Key Message:** AI-native platform democratizing college sports recruiting
**Speaking Points:**
- "We're building the future of college athletic recruiting"
- Position as solving broken process for everyone (athletes, coaches, families)
- AI + sports recruiting = massive opportunity

### Slide 2-3: The Problem
**Duration:** 3 minutes
**Key Message:** Multi-stakeholder pain across athletes, coaches, and advisors
**Speaking Points:**
- Athletes spend 20+ hours/week on manual tasks
- Coaches drowning in busywork (nights & weekends)
- Current ecosystem is fragmented (no single source of truth)
- Legacy platforms tack on AI vs. AI-native
- Quote: "We're spending more time figuring out recruiting than practicing"

### Slide 4: Why Now?
**Duration:** 1.5 minutes
**Key Message:** Perfect timing - market shift + tech maturity + founder moment
**Speaking Points:**
- NCAA rule changes (transfer portal exploding)
- Generative AI explosion (cost dropped 90%+ in 18 months)
- Gen Z expectations (mobile-first, social, AI-powered)
- Tech infrastructure now ready (AI frameworks, livestreaming, vector databases)
- $58B sports tech investment (2020-2024)

### Slide 5-6: The Solution
**Duration:** 4 minutes
**Key Message:** AI-native recruiting ecosystem ("LinkedIn + TikTok for recruiting")
**Speaking Points:**
- Two products, one ecosystem: Athlead.AI + Athlead.TV
- Five-step user journey (sign up → stream → AI analyzes → coaches watch → family subscribes)
- Value props for all stakeholders (athletes get discovery, coaches get time savings, families get clarity)
- Target: 40%+ time savings for coaches

### Slide 7: Competitive Advantage
**Duration:** 2 minutes
**Key Message:** AI-native, not AI-bolted-on
**Speaking Points:**
- Competitive matrix (we win on AI matching, livestreaming, automation, social)
- AI-native architecture (built 2025 vs. 20-year-old legacy platforms)
- Livestreaming moat (unique network effects)
- Social layer creates stickiness
- Founder-market fit (domain expertise + technical capability)
- "By the time incumbents respond, we'll have network effects locked in"

### Slide 8: Product Demo
**Duration:** 2 minutes
**Key Message:** Show speed and ease of use
**Speaking Points:**
- Athlete app: Create profile in 2 minutes, one-tap livestream
- Coach platform: Pipeline dashboard, AI prospect intel, bulk messaging
- Athlead.TV: Live games + automatic archiving
- "Athletes create profile faster than writing one email"

### Slide 9: Traction & Validation
**Duration:** 1.5 minutes
**Key Message:** We've validated the problem and solution
**Speaking Points:**
- 50+ coach interviews, 100+ family interviews
- Feedback: "If you can save me 5 hours per week, I'm in"
- Beta testing with local families
- Transfer portal: 1000+ transfers in 2024 vs. 10 five years ago
- NCSA revenue declining 15% YoY

### Slide 10: Business Model
**Duration:** 2 minutes
**Key Message:** Multiple revenue streams, clear unit economics
**Speaking Points:**
- Athlete tiers: Free → $9.99 → $14.99 → $19.99/month
- Coach tiers: Free → $49.99/month (200-500 coaches per university)
- Athlead.TV: $7.99 → $14.99/month
- Year 1: ~$183K revenue (conservative)
- Year 2: ~$3M revenue (Series A benchmark)
- LTV/CAC ratio: 5-10x

### Slide 11: Go-to-Market Strategy
**Duration:** 2 minutes
**Key Message:** 3-phase approach to product-market fit
**Speaking Points:**
- Phase 1 (Q3-Q4 2025): Viral growth (free tier, $5K scholarship loop, 1,000 athletes)
- Phase 2 (Q1-Q2 2026): Partnerships (youth coaches, clubs, multi-sport, 10,000 athletes)
- Phase 3 (Q3-Q4 2026): Institutional scale (high schools, athletic departments, 50,000 athletes)
- CAC target: $15 (vs. $50-100 traditional SaaS)

### Slide 12: 18-Month Roadmap
**Duration:** 1 minute
**Key Message:** Clear path to Series A readiness
**Speaking Points:**
- Q4 2025: 1,000 MAU, 50 programs, 40% MoM growth
- Q2 2026: 10,000 MAU, 500 programs, $100K MRR
- Q4 2026: 50,000 MAU, 1,000 programs, $250K MRR, Series A ready

### Slide 13: Use of Funds
**Duration:** 1.5 minutes
**Key Message:** Strategic capital allocation
**Speaking Points:**
- Product development: $750K (50%) - 4 engineers, AI/ML, infrastructure
- Marketing & growth: $450K (30%) - influencer partnerships, paid ads
- Operations & team: $225K (15%) - salaries, hiring
- Legal & compliance: $75K (5%) - child safety, NCAA compliance
- 18-month runway, monthly burn $83K

### Slide 14: Market Opportunity
**Duration:** 1 minute
**Key Message:** $4.7B TAM with clear growth path
**Speaking Points:**
- TAM: $4.7B (15.7M athletes × $300/year)
- SAM: $1.08B (recruiting-active athletes + families + coaches)
- SOM: $50-100M (5-10% of SAM within 3 years)
- Market growth: $37.5B → $85.2B (2022-2031, CAGR 7-10%)

### Slide 15: Risks & Mitigations
**Duration:** 1.5 minutes
**Key Message:** We've thought this through
**Speaking Points:**
- Child safety: Age verification, parental consent, background checks, child safety officer
- NCAA compliance: AI compliance agent, expert review
- Coach adoption: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantified time savings
- Data security: SOC2 Type II, encryption, cybersecurity insurance
- AI bias: Fairness constraints, regular audits, transparent outputs
- Network effects: Free tier, scholarship loop, geographic clustering

### Slide 16: Competitive Landscape
**Duration:** 1.5 minutes
**Key Message:** Why we win - AI-native in legacy market
**Speaking Points:**
- NCSA: 20+ years old, recently sold, $100M+ revenue, basic AI tacked on
- FieldLevel: 10 years old, no AI automation, no livestreaming
- SportsRecruits: Acquired by NCSA in 2024
- Why we win: AI-native architecture, livestreaming moat, social layer, founder-market fit, timing

### Slide 17-18: The Ask & Vision
**Duration:** 4 minutes
**Key Message:** Join us in revolutionizing college recruiting
**Speaking Points:**
- **The Ask:** $1.5M SAFE at $10M cap
- What we'll achieve: MVP across 3 sports, 10,000+ athletes, 100+ paying programs, $100K+ MRR
- Investment terms: SAFE, $10M cap, 10-15% dilution
- **The Vision:** "In five years, Athlead will be the standard platform for college recruiting. We'll have democratized access to college sports."

- **Closing:** "We're not just building software. We're transforming an industry that's been broken for 20 years. The market is ready. The technology is ready. We're ready. Let's go build something special."

## Total Timing

- **Q&A:** 5-10 minutes
- **Total:** ~30 minutes

### "Isn't NCSA the market leader?"
**Response:** Yes, but they're legacy/post-acquisition and distracted. We're AI-native and moving fast. By the time they respond (1-2 years), we'll have network effects locked in.

### "How do you solve the chicken-egg problem?"
**Response:** Free athlete tier + $5K scholarship viral loop + influencer partnerships with coaches. We're starting with niche (volleyball clubs) and geographic clustering (3-4 states).

### "What about regulatory risk?"
**Response:** We've built compliance into the product from day one. AI compliance agent monitors NCAA violations. Hiring child safety officer. Age verification and parental consent flows. SOC2 Type II by Year 1.

### "Can you compete with a 20-year incumbent?"
**Response:** They're distracted post-acquisition. We have founder-market fit (20+ years domain expertise + AI technical capability). We're building the product they should have built but can't because of legacy architecture.

### "What if transfer portal rules change?"
**Response:** Our addressable market expands with any recruiting rule change. More optionality = more need for discovery and matching tools.

input.content:
# Athlead Pitch Deck - Quick Reference Card

## The Elevator Pitch (30 seconds)
"Athlead is the AI-native platform for college recruiting. We're solving a broken process that wastes 20+ hours per week for athletes and coaches. Think LinkedIn meets TikTok for sports recruiting - with AI matching, one-tap livestreaming, and social features that legacy platforms like NCSA lack. We're raising $1.5M to build this across 3 sports and hit $100K MRR in 18 months."

## The Big Numbers (Memorize These)

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| **Market** | $4.7B TAM, $1.08B SAM |
| **Users** | 15.7M athletes, 39M families, 20K coaches |
| **Raise** | $1.5M SAFE at $10M cap |
| **Runway** | 18 months |
| **Unit Economics** | LTV/CAC 5-10x, CAC $15 |
| **Revenue Y1** | $183K (conservative) |
| **Revenue Y2** | $3M (Series A benchmark) |
| **Users by Q4 2026** | 50,000 athletes, 5,000 coaches |
| **Series A Target** | Q4 2026, $5-10M round |

## The Problem (2 sentences)
Athletes and families spend 20+ hours per week on manual recruiting tasks (copy-pasting emails, organizing spreadsheets, creating highlight videos). Coaches are drowning in busywork, spending nights and weekends on manual prospect research instead of coaching, with high risk of NCAA violations.

## The Solution (2 sentences)
Athlead is an AI-native recruiting ecosystem with two products: Athlead.AI (recruiting automation + social hub) and Athlead.TV (one-tap livestreaming). We use AI to match athletes to perfect-fit colleges, automate communication, and create a social community that drives viral growth.

## Why Now? (3 points)
1. **NCAA rule changes** - Transfer portal exploded (1000+ transfers in 2024 vs. 10 five years ago)
2. **Generative AI explosion** - Cost of inference dropped 90%+ in 18 months; frameworks now production-ready
3. **Gen Z expectations** - 15.7M athletes expect mobile-first, social, AI-powered platforms (not spreadsheets)

## Competitive Advantage (4 points)
1. **AI-native** - Built 2025 with AI at core vs. legacy platforms retrofitting AI
2. **Livestreaming moat** - One-tap go-live creates unique network effects
3. **Social layer** - Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms
4. **Founder-market fit** - 20+ years domain expertise + deep AI technical capability

## Go-to-Market (3 phases)
- **Phase 1** (Q3-Q4 2025): Viral growth - Free tier, $5K scholarship loop → 1,000 athletes
- **Phase 2** (Q1-Q2 2026): Partnerships - Youth coaches, clubs, multi-sport → 10,000 athletes
- **Phase 3** (Q3-Q4 2026): Institutional - High schools, athletic departments → 50,000 athletes

## Use of Funds ($1.5M)
- **50% Product** ($750K): 4 engineers, AI/ML development, infrastructure
- **30% Marketing** ($450K): Influencer partnerships, paid ads, events
- **15% Operations** ($225K): Salaries, hiring, recruiting
- **5% Legal/Compliance** ($75K): Child safety, NCAA compliance

## Key Risks & Mitigations
- ⚠️ **Child safety** → Mitigation: Age verification, parental consent, background checks, child safety officer
- ⚠️ **NCAA compliance** → Mitigation: AI compliance agent, expert review, closed beta
- ⚠️ **Coach adoption** → Mitigation: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantified time savings
- ⚠️ **Network effects** → Mitigation: Free athlete tier, scholarship loop, geographic clustering

## Traction & Validation
- 50+ coach interviews, 100+ family interviews
- Feedback: *"If you can save me 5 hours per week, I'm in"*
- Beta testing with local families
- 3 pilot clubs lined up for Q3 2025
- Waitlist site live and capturing demand

## The Vision (30 seconds)
"In five years, Athlead will be the standard platform for college recruiting. Every athlete will have a digital recruiting profile. Every coach will use Athlead to discover and manage prospects. We'll have democratized access to college sports - no more advantages for wealthy families. Every athlete, regardless of background, will have the tools to get discovered."

## Closing Statement
"We're not just building software. We're transforming an industry that's been broken for 20 years. The market is ready. The technology is ready. We're ready. Let's go build something special."

---

## Common Objections & Quick Responses

**"NCSA is the market leader"**
→ "Yes, 20-year-old legacy platform, recently sold, distracted. We're AI-native and moving fast. By the time they respond, we'll have network effects locked in."

**"Chicken-egg problem?"**
→ "Free athlete tier + $5K scholarship viral loop + influencer partnerships. Starting with niche (volleyball clubs) and geographic clustering."

**"Regulatory risk?"**
→ "Compliance built into product from day one. AI compliance agent, child safety officer, SOC2 Type II by Year 1."

**"Transfer portal rules might change?"**
→ "Any change expands our market. More optionality = more need for discovery and matching tools."

---

## Investment Terms Summary

- **Structure:** SAFE (Simple Agreement for Future Equity)
- **Amount:** $1.5M
- **Valuation Cap:** $10M post-money
- **Discount:** None (standard SAFE)
- **Dilution:** 10-15% this round
- **Use:** Product (50%), Marketing (30%), Ops (15%), Legal (5%)
- **Runway:** 18 months to Series A
- **Next Round:** Q4 2026, $5-10M Series A

---

## Contact & Next Steps

**Corey Young** - CEO & Co-Founder
- Former fintech founder
- Deep AI/ML expertise (generative AI research + implementation)

**Karen Young** - CMO & Co-Founder
- 20+ years youth sports involvement
- 3 generations of college athletes in family
- Personal experience with recruiting pain

**Website:** athlead.ai (coming soon)
**Deck:** Available on request
**Demo:** Staging environment access available
**Follow-up:** Data room, financial model, customer testimonials

---

Print this page and keep it handy during investor meetings!

--- layout: default --- # The Problem ## College Recruiting is Broken for Everyone
### Athletes & Families - **20+ hours/week** on manual recruitment tasks - Manually reviewing film and creating highlight videos - Copy-pasting emails to hundreds of coaches - Manual research on programs and fit - Lack of guidance from clubs and teams
"We're spending more time trying to figure out recruiting than practicing."
**Impact:** - Missed opportunities from lack of exposure - Wrong fit colleges due to poor matching - Time taken away from academics
### College Coaches - Countless hours per week on manual tasks - Nights & weekends lost to prospect research - Hours spent copy-pasting individual emails - Endless video reviews across platforms - Manual list management with spreadsheets - Travel constraints and budget limitations - **Compliance risk** (NCAA adherence)
"The smaller the college, the more these problems compound."
**Impact:** - Incomplete recruiting pipelines - Missed talent due to limited visibility - Risk of NCAA violations
--- layout: default --- # The Problem (continued)
### Advisors / High School Coaches - Become de facto recruiting advisors despite lack of time - Must manage 5-15 athletes' recruiting progress - Adding **5-10 hours per week** to existing demanding job - Difficulty tracking progress across multiple athletes - Challenge of staying current with NCAA rules **Impact:** - Burnout and limited guidance quality - Inconsistent advice across athletes
### The Current Reality - Fragmented ecosystem across emails, spreadsheets, videos on multiple platforms - **No single source of truth** for recruits, coaches, or families - Manual, time-consuming workflows that don't scale - Existing "solutions" (NCSA, FieldLevel, SportsRecruits) are **legacy platforms** that tack on AI
### Market Signal
$37.5B → $85.2B
Global youth sports market (2022-2031)
Gen Z
Expects AI-powered, mobile-first experiences
10+ years
Since recruiting tech last evolved
--- layout: default --- # Why Now? ## Perfect Timing: Market Shift + Tech Maturity
### Market Catalysts **1. NCAA Rule Changes** - New transfer portal rules (2021+) dramatically expanded addressable market - Athletes now have more control and options - Transfer portal searches are manual and painful - Coaches need better discovery tools **2. Generative AI Explosion** - AI agent frameworks now production-ready (LangChain, Vercel AI SDK, Claude) - Cost of inference dropped **90%+ in 18 months** - Enterprises expect AI-native solutions - Sports tech ripe for AI disruption **3. Gen Z & Alpha Expectations** - 15.7M youth athletes expect TikTok/Instagram, not spreadsheets - Network effects and social proof drive adoption - Livestreaming infrastructure now commodity
### Technical Readiness **Infrastructure Now Available:** - **AI Agent Frameworks:** LangChain, LlamaIndex, Vercel AI SDK production-grade - **Video Streaming:** Global CDN (Cloudflare, AWS) reduces latency - **Cost Structure:** Running AI inference at scale now economically viable - **Database Infrastructure:** Vector databases (Pinecone, Neon) enable AI-powered matching ### Investment Signal
$58B
Global sports tech investments (2020-2024)
Recruiting tech is notably underinvested — opportunity gap
"We're arriving at exactly the right time. The market is shifting, the tech is ready, and there's a 10-year incumbent gap."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # The Solution ## Athlead: The AI-Native Recruiting Ecosystem
"LinkedIn and TikTok had a baby focused on college recruiting."
Athlead.AI
Recruiting Automation + Social Hub
  • ✓ Centralized dashboard
  • ✓ AI-powered matching & discovery
  • ✓ Mobile-first social features
Athlead.TV
Livestreaming & On-Demand Film
  • ✓ One-tap livestreaming
  • ✓ Coach access to live talent
  • ✓ Fan engagement (families, peers, scouts)

Sign Up

### For Student-Athletes - Centralized Dashboard - AI College Matching - Recruiting Timeline & Guidance - Social Athlete Profile - AI-assisted Communication - Social Community

### For Parents/Families - Progress Monitoring Dashboard - Guidance Library - Alert System - Shared Collaboration
--- layout: default --- # Competitive Advantage ## AI-Native, Not AI-Bolted-On
| Capability | Athlead | NCSA | FieldLevel | SportsRecruits | |-----------|---------|------|-----------|----------------| | **AI Intelligent Matching** | ✓ Agentic engine | ✗ None | ✗ None | ✗ Basic chat | | **Livestreaming** | ✓ One-tap go-live | ✗ None | ✗ None | ✗ None | | **AI-Generated Highlights** | ✓ Automated AI | ✗ Manual upload | ✗ Manual upload | ✗ Manual | | **Recruiting Automation** | ✓ Agentic automation | ✗ Hired help | ✗ None | ✗ None | | **Mobile-First Social** | ✓ Social feed | ✗ Web-first | ✗ Web-first | ✗ Deprecated | | **Platform Age** | Built 2025 (AI-native) | 20+ years (legacy) | 10+ years | Acquired 2024 |
### Key Differentiation 1. **AI-Native Architecture** - Built from ground up with AI agents at core 2. **Livestreaming Moat** - Network effects: more athletes → more coaches watching 3. **Social Layer** - Community vs. transactional platforms 4. **Founder-Market Fit** - Deep expertise + technical capability
### Competitive Response
- Legacy platforms bolt on livestreaming → **1-2 years, high effort** - Add social features → **cultural misfit** - Rebuild architecture → **3-5 year effort**
"By the time incumbents respond, we'll have network effects, coach adoption, and athlete habit locked in."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # Product Demo ## See It in Action
Athlete Mobile App
  • ✓ Create profile in 2 minutes
  • ✓ Browse personalized college recommendations
  • ✓ Social feed with peers' recruiting wins
  • ✓ One-tap livestream button
  • ✓ Centralized coach messages
Coach Platform

  • ✓ Pipeline dashboard (prospects at each stage)

Athlead.TV
  • ✓ Live game streaming

"Athletes create a recruiting profile in less time than it takes to write one email.
Coaches discover talent without leaving their desk."
--- layout: default --- # Traction & Validation ## We've Validated the Problem and the Solution
### Customer Research **College Coaches Interviewed:** - Across all division levels (D1, D2, D3, NAIA) - Primary pain: Time spent on manual tasks - Feedback: *"If you can save me 5 hours per week, I'm in"* **Families & Athletes:** - Hundreds of interviews confirming frustrations - Primary pain: Confusion about recruiting process - Feedback: *"We need a guide and a place to show off our athlete"* ### Product Validation - **AI Recruiting Assistant:** Development near completion - **Technical Infrastructure:** Mobile app & livestreaming finalizing - **AI Matching Algorithm:** Foundation set, building out models
### Early Testing - **Beta Testing:** Athletes and families testing early MVP - **Waitlist Site:** Live and capturing demand - **Pilot Program:** Ready to onboard first 3 clubs for Q3 2025 ### Market Research

Personal recruiting experiences + 20+ year network
What This Shows: 50+ coaches and 100+ families confirm the problem is real. We have a working prototype, early demand signals, and the market is shifting.
--- layout: default --- # Business Model ## Multiple Revenue Streams, Clear Unit Economics
### Athlete Tiers (Monthly)

### Athlead.TV Tiers

### Revenue Projections
Year 1 (Conservative)
  • 1,000 paid athletes: $144K
  • 50 coaching programs: $15K
  • Athlead.TV (2,000 subs): $24K
Total: ~$183K

--- layout: default --- # Go-to-Market Strategy ## 3-Phase Approach
### Phase 1: Viral Growth #### Months 1-6 (Q3-Q4 2025) **Strategy:** - Free tier with social features - $5K scholarship viral loop - Network effects drive adoption - First 3 pilot programs **Success Metrics:** - 1,000+ athlete profiles - 50+ recruiting programs - 40% MoM organic growth - First revenue: 100 paid subscriptions
### Phase 2: Partnerships #### Months 7-12 (Q1-Q2 2026) **Strategy:** - Youth coach partnerships - Club team partnerships - Parent testimonials & case studies - Multi-sport expansion **Success Metrics:** - 200+ recruiting programs - 10,000+ athlete profiles - 1,000+ coaches monthly active - $15 CAC validated
### Phase 3: Institutional Scale #### Months 13-18 (Q3-Q4 2026) **Strategy:** - High school partnerships - Athletic department partnerships - Tournament streaming - B2B2C model established **Success Metrics:** - 50,000+ athlete profiles - 5 sports supported - 500+ high schools - Series A ready
Clear Path to Product-Market Fit: Viral growth → Influencer partnerships → Institutional buyers
--- layout: default --- # 18-Month Roadmap ## Clear Path to Series A Readiness
### Q3-Q4 2025: Launch & Learn **Objective:** Validate product-market fit **Key Milestones:** - ✓ AI Recruiting Assistant (complete) - ✓ Technical infrastructure tested - ✓ Volleyball AI models deployed - ✓ Launch with 3 pilot clubs - ✓ 1,000 athletes onboarded - ✓ First 50 recruiting programs **Metrics by End Q4:** - 1,000 MAU athletes - 50 recruiting programs - 40% MoM organic growth
### Q1-Q2 2026: Scale & Expand **Objective:** Prove model repeatable **Key Milestones:** - ✓ Scale to 10,000 athlete profiles - ✓ Launch basketball and football - ✓ 100+ paid college programs - ✓ Influencer partnership program - ✓ Hit $500K+ ARR - ✓ Coach NPS: 40+ **Metrics by End Q2:** - 10,000 MAU athletes - 500 recruiting programs - 1,000 coaches MAU - $100K MRR - LTV/CAC ratio: 3-5x
### Q3-Q4 2026: Series A Ready **Objective:** Achieve product-market fit **Key Milestones:** - ✓ 50,000 athlete profiles (5 sports) - ✓ 500+ high school partnerships - ✓ 50+ university athletic depts - ✓ 5,000+ coaches MAU - ✓ Proven unit economics - ✓ $2-3M ARR **Metrics by End Q4:** - 50,000 MAU athletes - 1,000+ recruiting programs - $250K+ MRR - Net revenue retention: 120%+ - **Series A ready: $5-10M**

--- layout: default --- # Risks & Mitigations ## We've Identified Key Risks and Have Strategies
⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA
Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits
⚠️ NCAA Compliance
NCAA rules change frequently; could enable violations
Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation

Athlete profiles contain sensitive data

Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Fairness constraints, regular bias audits, transparent outputs, feedback mechanism
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable at critical mass (chicken-egg)

One-tap livestreaming creates unique network effects. Competitors have no livestreaming.

Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth.

Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability.

NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.

--- theme: default background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a 0%, #1a1a2e 100%) class: text-center highlighter: shiki lineNumbers: false info: | ## Athlead Seed Round Pitch Deck AI-Powered Athletic Recruiting & Livestreaming Platform drawings: persist: false transition: slide-left title: Athlead - Seed Round Pitch mdc: true ---

Athlead

AI-Powered Athletic Recruiting & Livestreaming

Where artificial intelligence meets athletic potential.
Where every athlete gets discovered.

Pre-Beta | Seed Fundraising

--- layout: default --- # The Problem ## College Recruiting is Broken for Everyone
### Athletes & Families - **20+ hours/week** on manual recruitment tasks - Manually reviewing film and creating highlight videos - Copy-pasting emails to hundreds of coaches - Manual research on programs and fit - Lack of guidance from clubs and teams
"We're spending more time trying to figure out recruiting than practicing."
**Impact:** - Missed opportunities from lack of exposure - Wrong fit colleges due to poor matching - Time taken away from academics
### College Coaches - Countless hours per week on manual tasks - Nights & weekends lost to prospect research - Hours spent copy-pasting individual emails - Endless video reviews across platforms - Manual list management with spreadsheets - Travel constraints and budget limitations - **Compliance risk** (NCAA adherence)
"The smaller the college, the more these problems compound."
**Impact:** - Incomplete recruiting pipelines - Missed talent due to limited visibility - Risk of NCAA violations
--- layout: default --- # The Problem (continued)
### Advisors / High School Coaches - Become de facto recruiting advisors despite lack of time - Must manage 5-15 athletes' recruiting progress - Adding **5-10 hours per week** to existing demanding job - Difficulty tracking progress across multiple athletes - Challenge of staying current with NCAA rules **Impact:** - Burnout and limited guidance quality - Inconsistent advice across athletes
### The Current Reality - Fragmented ecosystem across emails, spreadsheets, videos on multiple platforms - **No single source of truth** for recruits, coaches, or families - Manual, time-consuming workflows that don't scale - Existing "solutions" (NCSA, FieldLevel, SportsRecruits) are **legacy platforms** that tack on AI
### Market Signal
$37.5B → $85.2B
Global youth sports market (2022-2031)
Gen Z
Expects AI-powered, mobile-first experiences
10+ years
Since recruiting tech last evolved
--- layout: default --- # Why Now? ## Perfect Timing: Market Shift + Tech Maturity
### Market Catalysts **1. NCAA Rule Changes** - New transfer portal rules (2021+) dramatically expanded addressable market - Athletes now have more control and options - Transfer portal searches are manual and painful - Coaches need better discovery tools **2. Generative AI Explosion** - AI agent frameworks now production-ready (LangChain, Vercel AI SDK, Claude) - Cost of inference dropped **90%+ in 18 months** - Enterprises expect AI-native solutions - Sports tech ripe for AI disruption **3. Gen Z & Alpha Expectations** - 15.7M youth athletes expect TikTok/Instagram, not spreadsheets - Network effects and social proof drive adoption - Livestreaming infrastructure now commodity
### Technical Readiness **Infrastructure Now Available:** - **AI Agent Frameworks:** LangChain, LlamaIndex, Vercel AI SDK production-grade - **Video Streaming:** Global CDN (Cloudflare, AWS) reduces latency - **Cost Structure:** Running AI inference at scale now economically viable - **Database Infrastructure:** Vector databases (Pinecone, Neon) enable AI-powered matching ### Investment Signal
$58B
Global sports tech investments (2020-2024)
Recruiting tech is notably underinvested — opportunity gap
"We're arriving at exactly the right time. The market is shifting, the tech is ready, and there's a 10-year incumbent gap."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # The Solution ## Athlead: The AI-Native Recruiting Ecosystem
"LinkedIn and TikTok had a baby focused on college recruiting."
Athlead.AI
Recruiting Automation + Social Hub
  • ✓ Centralized dashboard
  • ✓ AI-powered matching & discovery
  • ✓ Mobile-first social features
Athlead.TV
Livestreaming & On-Demand Film
  • ✓ One-tap livestreaming
  • ✓ Coach access to live talent
  • ✓ Fan engagement (families, peers, scouts)
--- layout: default --- # How It Works ## The Five-Step User Journey
1
Sign Up
Create profile in 2 minutes
2
Start Streaming
One tap to go live
3
AI Analyzes
Team-DNA AI matches
4
Coaches Watch
Live + archived film
5
Family Subscribes
Alerts & highlights
### For Student-Athletes - Centralized Dashboard - AI College Matching - Recruiting Timeline & Guidance - Social Athlete Profile - AI-assisted Communication - Social Community
### For College Coaches - Intelligent Discovery - Pipeline Management Dashboard - AI-Powered Prospect Intelligence - Communication Automation - Video Scouting Hub - AI Compliance Agent - **Target: 40%+ time savings**
### For Parents/Families - Progress Monitoring Dashboard - Guidance Library - Alert System - Shared Collaboration
--- layout: default --- # Competitive Advantage ## AI-Native, Not AI-Bolted-On
| Capability | Athlead | NCSA | FieldLevel | SportsRecruits | |-----------|---------|------|-----------|----------------| | **AI Intelligent Matching** | ✓ Agentic engine | ✗ None | ✗ None | ✗ Basic chat | | **Livestreaming** | ✓ One-tap go-live | ✗ None | ✗ None | ✗ None | | **AI-Generated Highlights** | ✓ Automated AI | ✗ Manual upload | ✗ Manual upload | ✗ Manual | | **Recruiting Automation** | ✓ Agentic automation | ✗ Hired help | ✗ None | ✗ None | | **Mobile-First Social** | ✓ Social feed | ✗ Web-first | ✗ Web-first | ✗ Deprecated | | **Platform Age** | Built 2025 (AI-native) | 20+ years (legacy) | 10+ years | Acquired 2024 |
### Key Differentiation 1. **AI-Native Architecture** - Built from ground up with AI agents at core 2. **Livestreaming Moat** - Network effects: more athletes → more coaches watching 3. **Social Layer** - Community vs. transactional platforms 4. **Founder-Market Fit** - Deep expertise + technical capability
### Competitive Response
- Legacy platforms bolt on livestreaming → **1-2 years, high effort** - Add social features → **cultural misfit** - Rebuild architecture → **3-5 year effort**
"By the time incumbents respond, we'll have network effects, coach adoption, and athlete habit locked in."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # Product Demo ## See It in Action
Athlete Mobile App
  • ✓ Create profile in 2 minutes
  • ✓ Browse personalized college recommendations
  • ✓ Social feed with peers' recruiting wins
  • ✓ One-tap livestream button
  • ✓ Centralized coach messages
Coach Platform
  • ✓ Search and filter athletes
  • ✓ Pipeline dashboard (prospects at each stage)
  • ✓ Video player (live + archived footage)
  • ✓ Prospect intel (comp players, fit score)
  • ✓ Bulk messaging with AI variations
Athlead.TV
  • ✓ Live game streaming
  • ✓ Chat/engagement (coaches, families, peers)
  • ✓ Automatic archiving to athlete profile
  • ✓ Highlight reel generation
"Athletes create a recruiting profile in less time than it takes to write one email.
Coaches discover talent without leaving their desk."
--- layout: default --- # Traction & Validation ## We've Validated the Problem and the Solution
### Customer Research **College Coaches Interviewed:** - Across all division levels (D1, D2, D3, NAIA) - Primary pain: Time spent on manual tasks - Feedback: *"If you can save me 5 hours per week, I'm in"* **Families & Athletes:** - Hundreds of interviews confirming frustrations - Primary pain: Confusion about recruiting process - Feedback: *"We need a guide and a place to show off our athlete"* ### Product Validation - **AI Recruiting Assistant:** Development near completion - **Technical Infrastructure:** Mobile app & livestreaming finalizing - **AI Matching Algorithm:** Foundation set, building out models
### Early Testing - **Beta Testing:** Athletes and families testing early MVP - **Waitlist Site:** Live and capturing demand - **Pilot Program:** Ready to onboard first 3 clubs for Q3 2025 ### Market Research
Transfer Portal Exploding
1000+ transfers in 2024 vs. 10 five years ago
NCSA Revenue Declining
15% YoY decline (user satisfaction dropping)
Founder Validation
Personal recruiting experiences + 20+ year network
What This Shows: 50+ coaches and 100+ families confirm the problem is real. We have a working prototype, early demand signals, and the market is shifting.
--- layout: default --- # Business Model ## Multiple Revenue Streams, Clear Unit Economics
### Athlete Tiers (Monthly)
Free
Basic profile + social features
JV - $9.99/month
Basic AI chat + manual messaging
Varsity - $14.99/month
Full Alex AI + recruiting automation
Elite - $19.99/month ⭐
Livestreaming + Team-DNA AI + all features
### Coach Tiers (B2B)
Free
Search recruits + view profiles + watch highlights
Pro - $49.99/month
Full AI suite + compliance agent + bulk messaging
### Athlead.TV Tiers
Fan - $7.99/month
Follow teams/players + highlight reels
Fanatic - $14.99/month
All-access to livestreams + archives
### Revenue Projections
Year 1 (Conservative)
  • 1,000 paid athletes: $144K
  • 50 coaching programs: $15K
  • Athlead.TV (2,000 subs): $24K
Total: ~$183K
Year 2 (Series A Benchmark)
  • 10,000 paid athletes: $1.56M
  • 200 coaching programs: $120K
  • Athlead.TV (10,000 subs): $1.32M
Total: ~$3M
CAC (Coach)
$50-100
LTV (Coach)
$500-1K/yr
LTV/CAC Ratio
5-10x
--- layout: default --- # Go-to-Market Strategy ## 3-Phase Approach
### Phase 1: Viral Growth #### Months 1-6 (Q3-Q4 2025) **Strategy:** - Free tier with social features - $5K scholarship viral loop - Network effects drive adoption - First 3 pilot programs **Success Metrics:** - 1,000+ athlete profiles - 50+ recruiting programs - 40% MoM organic growth - First revenue: 100 paid subscriptions
### Phase 2: Partnerships #### Months 7-12 (Q1-Q2 2026) **Strategy:** - Youth coach partnerships - Club team partnerships - Parent testimonials & case studies - Multi-sport expansion **Success Metrics:** - 200+ recruiting programs - 10,000+ athlete profiles - 1,000+ coaches monthly active - $15 CAC validated
### Phase 3: Institutional Scale #### Months 13-18 (Q3-Q4 2026) **Strategy:** - High school partnerships - Athletic department partnerships - Tournament streaming - B2B2C model established **Success Metrics:** - 50,000+ athlete profiles - 5 sports supported - 500+ high schools - Series A ready
Clear Path to Product-Market Fit: Viral growth → Influencer partnerships → Institutional buyers
--- layout: default --- # 18-Month Roadmap ## Clear Path to Series A Readiness
### Q3-Q4 2025: Launch & Learn **Objective:** Validate product-market fit **Key Milestones:** - ✓ AI Recruiting Assistant (complete) - ✓ Technical infrastructure tested - ✓ Volleyball AI models deployed - ✓ Launch with 3 pilot clubs - ✓ 1,000 athletes onboarded - ✓ First 50 recruiting programs **Metrics by End Q4:** - 1,000 MAU athletes - 50 recruiting programs - 40% MoM organic growth
### Q1-Q2 2026: Scale & Expand **Objective:** Prove model repeatable **Key Milestones:** - ✓ Scale to 10,000 athlete profiles - ✓ Launch basketball and football - ✓ 100+ paid college programs - ✓ Influencer partnership program - ✓ Hit $500K+ ARR - ✓ Coach NPS: 40+ **Metrics by End Q2:** - 10,000 MAU athletes - 500 recruiting programs - 1,000 coaches MAU - $100K MRR - LTV/CAC ratio: 3-5x
### Q3-Q4 2026: Series A Ready **Objective:** Achieve product-market fit **Key Milestones:** - ✓ 50,000 athlete profiles (5 sports) - ✓ 500+ high school partnerships - ✓ 50+ university athletic depts - ✓ 5,000+ coaches MAU - ✓ Proven unit economics - ✓ $2-3M ARR **Metrics by End Q4:** - 50,000 MAU athletes - 1,000+ recruiting programs - $250K+ MRR - Net revenue retention: 120%+ - **Series A ready: $5-10M**

--- layout: default --- # Market Opportunity ## $4.7B Total Addressable Market
### Market Size Calculation
Total Addressable Market (TAM)
$4.7B
15.7M youth athletes × $300/year avg. recruiting spend
Serviceable Addressable Market (SAM)
$1.08B
Recruiting-active athletes + 39M families + 20K coaches
Serviceable Obtainable Market (Year 3)
$50-100M
5-10% of SAM within 3 years
### Market Growth Drivers
Global Youth Sports Market
$37.5B → $85.2B
2022 to 2030-2031

Transfer Portal Impact
Expanded addressable market by 5-10x
More athletes eligible, more coaches recruiting
Tech Adoption Curve
Recruiting tech moving from manual to software-enabled
(Similar to enterprise recruiting 10 years ago)

--- layout: default --- # Risks & Mitigations ## We've Identified Key Risks and Have Strategies
⚠️ Child Safety & Regulatory
Platform involves minors; must comply with COPPA, FERPA
Mitigation: Child safety officer, age verification, parental consent, background checks, compliance audits
⚠️ NCAA Compliance
NCAA rules change frequently; could enable violations
Mitigation: AI compliance agent, communication guidelines, expert review, closed beta validation
⚠️ Coach Adoption Challenges
Coaches conservative; switching cost from email/spreadsheets high
Mitigation: Free tier, influencer partnerships, quantify time savings, flexible pricing
⚠️ Data Security
Athlete profiles contain sensitive data
Mitigation: Encrypt all PII, SOC2 Type II (Year 1), security audits, user-controlled privacy
⚠️ AI Accuracy & Bias
Team-DNA matching could produce biased recommendations
Mitigation: Fairness constraints, regular bias audits, transparent outputs, feedback mechanism
⚠️ Network Effects Dependency
Platform only valuable at critical mass (chicken-egg)
Mitigation: Free athlete tier, $5K scholarship loop, niche start (volleyball), geographic clustering
Risk Management: Critical risks identified with mitigation strategies built into product roadmap and budget
--- layout: default --- # Competitive Landscape ## Why We Win: AI-Native in Legacy Market
### Direct Competitors
NCSA (Largest Player)
  • • Founded 1997 (20+ years old)
  • • 2M athletes, 10K coaches
  • • Revenue: ~$100M+ (estimated)
  • • AI: Basic chat (recently tacked on)
  • • Weakness: Legacy architecture, recently sold
FieldLevel
  • • Founded 2015 (10 years old)
  • • 1M athletes, 5K coaches
  • • Revenue: $10-20M (estimated)
  • • Weakness: No AI, no livestreaming
SportsRecruits
  • • Founded 2008
  • • 500K athletes
  • • Weakness: Acquired by NCSA in 2024
### Why We Win
1. AI-Native Architecture
Built 2025 with AI at core vs. retrofitting. Better product, faster iteration, defensible tech.
2. Livestreaming Moat
One-tap livestreaming creates unique network effects. Competitors have no livestreaming.
3. Social Layer
Community and stickiness vs. transactional platforms. Higher retention, word-of-mouth.
4. Founder-Market Fit
Deep domain expertise (20+ years sports) + AI technical capability.
5. Timing
NCSA post-acquisition and distracted. AI proven tech. Market primed for new entrant.
"By the time incumbents respond (1-2 years), we'll have network effects, coach adoption, and athlete habit locked in."
--- layout: center class: text-center --- # The Ask & Vision ## Join Us in Revolutionizing College Recruiting
$1.5M SAFE at $10M cap
### What We'll Achieve - **Product:** MVP across 3 sports with AI-native features - **Traction:** 10,000+ athletes, 100+ paying programs, $100K+ MRR - **Team:** Hire 6-8 core team members - **Market:** Establish in 5-10 states - **Path to Series A:** $5-10M round in Q4 2026
### Investment Terms - **Structure:** SAFE - **Valuation Cap:** $10M post-money - **No Discount:** Standard SAFE - **Dilution:** 10-15% this round
### Our Vision "In five years, Athlead will be the standard platform for college recruiting. Every athlete will have a digital recruiting profile. Every coach will use Athlead to discover and manage prospects. Every family will use Athlead to navigate the recruiting process. **We'll have democratized access to college sports**—no more advantages for wealthy families who can afford recruiting consultants."
--- layout: center class: text-center ---
Why This Matters
15.7M
youth athletes deserve opportunity

families deserve clarity

coaches deserve efficiency
Athlead is the platform that makes it happen.
